How to Reach Me

Electronically

This is by far the most reliable way to contact me. I highly recommend it.

Paul Franklin <paul@cs.washington.edu>

At School

My office is in Sieg Hall, room 431, at the University of Washington. Sieg Hall is near the HUB, between Allen Library and Guggenheim Hall. It's also roughly between the HUB and the fountain.

The UW Daily, our student newspaper, has declared Sieg the ugliest building on campus. The best part about having an offince inside is you don't realize how ugly it looks from the outside, except when you're in the west stairwell. 

    Paul Franklin
    +1-206-543 5143
    +1-206-543 2969 (fax)
